mapper.select: select tb_scraplog.id, tb_user.username as userUsername, tb_user.name as userName, tb_property.pname as propertyName, tb_scraplog.number, tb_property.spec as propertySpec, tb_scraplog.time, tb_scraplog.remark from tb_scraplog left join tb_user on tb_scraplog.user_id = tb_user.uid left join tb_property on tb_scraplog.property_id = tb_property.pid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
